audioText: Nos collègues viendront certainement nous aider à terminer ce projet important avant la date limite.
question: What will the colleagues do?
options: Help finish the important project before the deadline.
Provide feedback on the preliminary results.
explanation: The text states 'Nos collègues viendront certainement nous aider à terminer ce projet important avant la date limite' - Our colleagues will certainly come to help us finish this important project before the deadline. 'Viendront' is the future form of 'venir' (to come).
